original_title: Sing a Song of Six Pants
overview: The three stooges pursue a notorious burglar in order to pay past due notes to the Skin & Flint company and save their tailor shop.
tagline: The Stooges are the Pip Boys tailors who get involved with a bank bandit. Shemp decides they should capture the robber to get the reward. Later remade in
title: Sing a Song of Six Pants
